4484520 4486880 It's one of the few places
I'm allowed a moment's peace.

4486920 4490160 You see,
they have an aversion to water.
4491280 4493160 One could almost call it a phobia.

4493680 4496800 Who are they?
What do they want from me?
4498400 4500360 Well, for now, let's just say...

4500400 4503000 that you were the subject
of their experiment.
4509160 4510800 And you are not a murderer.
4512680 4514360 I'm sorry about this. I truly am.
4514400 4515840 But we do not have much time...

4515880 4518400 and I cannot afford the luxury
of doing this the right way.

4519960 4522200 all the answers
are in this syringe.
4522240 4523360 I need you to inject yourself.

4523400 4525720 It's the only way to
make you understand.

4527040 4529880 We're running out of time, John.
You have to do this now.

4531880 4534240 Inspector, he is more
disturbed than we thought.

4534280 4536880 I may not be the judge of personality
that you are, Doctor...

4536920 4539760 but you're the one
who looks disturbed to me.

4540640 4542360 You do not know
what you are doing.

4548640 4550720 All the answers you've
been looking for, John.

4553320 4558160 Guess I'll just have to
hold on to it for...safekeeping.

4561960 4567120 - Go? Where are we going?
- Shell Beach.
4568120 4570400 That's where you want to go, isn't it?
4583720 4585280 What do you hope to gain by helping me?

4587520 4590400 None of these maps extend far enough
to show the ocean.

4591800 4593640 I promise you!
I've been there, and--

4593680 4596120 If you've been there,
you can show us the way, then, can't you?

4601840 4604480 I refuse.
You can't make me go there!

4629560 4632960 I don't understand.
Used to be a bridge here.

4639400 4640920 Try that again,
your friends are gonna be...
4641000 4642280 fishing you out of the canal.

4642280 4643640 Just don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.

4662240 4666560 We will give you some more
pretty things soon...Anna.
4675680 4678400 I have another use for her first.

4684880 4689880 First there was darkness.
Then came the strangers.

4691960 4694160 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4699400 4702200 They mix and match
our memories as they see fit...

4702240 4704880 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4705560 4708200 One day, a man
might be an inspector.

4711080 4714240 When they want to
study a murderer for instance...

4714280 4717920 they simply imprint one of their citizens
with a new personality...

4719000 4722840 arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...

4728200 4732120 Will a man, given the history
of a killer, continue in that vein?

4732160 4735960 Or are we, in fact, more
than the mere sum of our memories?

4736040 4740800 This business of you being a killer
was an unhappy coincidence.

4740840 4743600 You have had dozens
of lives before now.

4743640 4746840 You just happened to wake up
while I was imprinting you with this one.
4747560 4749600 Why are they doing all of this?
4749640 4752920 It is our capacity for individuality...

4752960 4755400 our souls that makes
us different from them.

4755440 4757720 They think they
can find the human soul...

4757760 4760760 if they understand
how our memories work.

4766240 4769520 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4769560 4771360 They think we can save them.

4771400 4773720 - Where do I fit in?
- You are different, John.

4774320 4777040 You resisted my attempt
to imprint you.

4781480 4784760 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.
4784800 4786040 That is how they change things.
4786080 4787520 That is how they built this city.

4787560 4790360 They have machines buried deep
beneath the surface...

4790400 4794160 that allow them
to focus their telepathic energies.

4795000 4797400 They control everything here,
even the sun.

4797440 4800640 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
4800680 4801880 So why do they need you?

4801920 4806120 When they first brought us here,
they extracted what was in us.

4806160 4809840 So they could store the information,
remix it like so much paint...

4809880 4812280 and give us back new memories
of their choosing.

4812320 4815800 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

4817600 4820640 I understood the intricacies
of the human mind...

4823120 4825760 so they allowed me
to keep my skills as a scientist...

4827200 4829560 But they made me
delete everything else.

4837600 4840320 Can you imagine what
it is like being forced...

4842040 4845240 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
4851560 4853360 This was blank when I found it!

4855360 4858440 You were never a boy...
not in this place.

4858480 4861160 Your entire history is an illusion,
a fabrication...
4861200 4863000 as it is with all of us.

4863040 4865440 You made those drawings
happen with your gift.
4865440 4867240 You say they brought us here.
4952680 4956640 There is nothing beyond the city.
5008680 5010720 And now you know the truth.

5076560 5079360 You'll allow yourself
to surrender, Mr. Murdoch...

5079400 5081520 or it will result in
this one's death, yes?

5081560 5083960 What do I care?
She's not my real wife!

5085160 5089200 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

5089240 5091800 You see, I have
become the monster...

5095480 5099200 Shall I end her life now
as you would have?

5154120 5156800 The doctor was right.
He has evolved.

5171880 5176160 Dangerous. But he can also
lead us to what we seek.
5176160 5179440 What the doctor calls the soul.

5179480 5183040 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

5183080 5185680 We no longer need
the other subjects.
5185720 5189200 The time for study is over.

5189240 5193280 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.

5226880 5231200 They want to imprint you
with their own collective memories.

5232520 5236480 They want to make you one of them,
so they can share your soul.
5246400 5249280 The pain will only last a moment.

5262800 5264680 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

5264720 5266400 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

5273240 5276320 Now remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.

5278120 5280840 You're probably wondering why I keep
appearing in your memories.

5280880 5283320 It is because I have
inserted myself in them.

5283360 5285360 All of these memories
have been fabricated...
5285400 5287040 to teach you about the strangers.

5287080 5290080 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.
5306120 5308160 You're getting the hang of it, John.

5308200 5310160 Maybe one day
I'll be working for you.

5310920 5314040 This is the machine the strangers use
to amplify their thoughts.
5315880 5317400 You must take control of it.
5317440 5319000 You must make the machine yours.
5319040 5321080 I know you can beat them, John.
5334960 5337600 There is no time for romance, John.
5337640 5339840 The world can be what you make it.

5341880 5344280 You have the power
to make anything happen...
5619000 5620400 I knew you could do it, John.
5626280 5629000 She is not Emma anymore, John.
5630400 5632040 So give her back her memories.

5632080 5634400 I can't. The facility
where the strangers...
5639480 5642080 What are you going to do now, John?

5643720 5647360 You told me I had
the power, didn't you?

5647760 5650160 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5651720 5653960 Make this world anything
I want it to be.

5654960 5657880 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.

5843840 5847040 I'm just making a few little changes
around here, is all.
5847080 5848720 Are we sure that's what we want?
5849200 5851560 I'm prepared to take my chances.

5853120 5855880 Your imprint is not
agreeable with my kind.

5857320 5859520 But I wanted to know
what it was like...

5862240 5864840 You know how I was
supposed to feel.

5868560 5872160 You wanted to know what it was
about us that made us human.

5873440 5876680 Well, you're not going
to find it...in here.

5878360 5880840 You went looking

5989240 5991960 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
5992000 5994520 I think that's it just over there.
6015760 6017720 Would you like to join me?
